TEI.2.document_title: Thomas G Western to Stephen F Austin, 12-21-1832

barker_notes.barker_summary: Thomas G. Western to Austin, Goliad, December 21, 1832. Political chiefs visit disappointing. He does not seem as strong for the cause as Austin represented.

*div1 type="summary"* *p*Thomas G. Western to Austin, Goliad, December 21, 1832. Political chiefs visit disappointing. He does not seem as strong for the cause as Austin represented.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Goliad Dec. 21— 1832*/p* *p*Col S. F. Austin*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Sn. Felipe*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dr. Sir/My respects in reply to your esteemed favor of the *date_mentioned n="12-06-1832">6th insi*/date_mentioned* were addressed to you at *location_mentioned*Bejar */location_mentioned*on *date_mentioned n="12-17-1832">monday last*/date_mentioned* by a private conveyance*/p*
*p*Nothing very material has occurred here—the Election for *person_mentioned*Municipal officers*/person_mentioned* has resulted in *person_mentioned*Mr. Aldrete*/person_mentioned*, a worthy and energetic man, Alcalde—*person_mentioned*Jn. Anto Santos Regidor*/person_mentioned*—and *person_mentioned*Nicholas Gal an Procurador*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*Chief of department*/person_mentioned* remained here a few days and proceeded to *location_mentioned*Guadalupe */location_mentioned*and thence to *location_mentioned*La Vaca*/location_mentioned* where he is now said to be— our *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*here think he is not as warm in the cause as your letter led us to anticipate— I endeavour to persuade them that he is, but that he does not wish to appear too prominent at this particular moment— that the affair may even appear to have originated in and emanated from the *person_mentioned*Ayuntamto of *location_mentioned*Bejar*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* and not from him nor with his official coadjutorship—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr. Alvan Wetherby*/person_mentioned* will probably hand you this— He is the Gentleman I mentioned to you when here— He visits your City for the express purpose of obtaining land *location_mentioned*in the litoral Leagues*/location_mentioned* and becoming a *person_mentioned*colonist */person_mentioned*of yours—he is a person I much esteem—is a *person_mentioned*Merchant*/person_mentioned*—will take considerable property into your quarter and in a word is an acquisition to your *location_mentioned*community*/location_mentioned*— I hope and trust you will grant him his request— As for myself I will say nothing— I expressed to you when here my desires and intentions, and leave the rest entirely to yourself confident that you will do or have already done all the requisite and much more than if I were present*/p*
*p*Your *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*here all join in the warmest expressions of friendship and desire me to present their cordial Salutations*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Thomas G. Western*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*A person just in from *location_mentioned*Matams*/location_mentioned* reports that *person_mentioned*Moctezuma */person_mentioned*had defeated *person_mentioned*Bustamte */person_mentioned*at *location_mentioned*Sn Luis Potosi*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*/div1*
